Synthesis of CoS
2
/C bipyramid prisms with the hierarchical surface (BPCS): To synthesize BPCS, the BPCO was refluxed with thioacetamide (TAA) for 12 min at 90 °C and precipitates were collected with centrifuge machine, after drying, the powder was heated at 350 °C for 2 h with the ramp rate of 2 °C min −1 under Ar atmosphere.
